active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between whitelisting allowed paths (proactive prevention) versus blacklisting traversal sequences (reactive detection) in a forensic context. Consider evasion techniques like double URL encoding and how they impact log analysis reliability. Support arguments with OWASP guidelines.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
